## Equation 1. Reduction in total model variance

$$

\frac{sum(\sigma^2_{null}) - sum(\sigma^2_{model})}{sum(\sigma^2_{null})}

$$

## Equation 2. Conditional R2

$$

s^2_{fixed-effect} = Var(\beta_1 x)\\\\

s^2_{total-variance} = s^2_{fixed-effect} + sum(\sigma^2) + \tau^2 \\\\

R^2_{conditional} = \frac{s^2_{fixed-effect}}{s^2_{total-variance}}

$$

## Equation 3. R2 \*

$$
\begin{flalign*}

s^2_{fixed-effect} = Var(\beta_1 x)\\\\

s^2_{yi} = Var(yi) \\\\

R^2_{conditional}* = \frac{s^2_{fixed-effect}}{s^2_{yi}}

\end{flalign*}

$$

## Equation 4. Effective N

$$
N_{effective} = \frac{4n_{1i}n_{2i}}{(n_{1i} + n_{2i})}
$$
